Carl Goodwin

I live in London and post-graduated with an MBA from Hult International Business School as valedictorian in 2001.

I served for 36 years at Big Blue, performing roles combining business (strategy and growth) leadership with data science and machine learning.

My passion for data science and machine learning extends beyond work. The tidyverse and tidymodels make this a real joy to do.

Adobe Fresco does the same for my little digital artworks to bring it all to life.
